title.normal: & Sky Rocket your confidence in just 30 days.

instructor.name: Ms. Priyanka Saini
instructor.description: Priyanka Saini has guided a number of people through their weight loss journey. Currently she holds 7+ years of experience in training corporates and industries for Zumba.

advantages.text: Full body workout with a dance form
Added advantage to your heart health

checklist.text: Your are a beginner and you want to lose belly fat?
Your schedule is hectic and you  want take classes on a convenient time slot??
You want to create a customized diet for yourself?
You want to stay fit,healthy and increase your strength?

faqs.question: Will I get to interact with my tutor?
faqs.answer: Yes! All the doubts and queries would be addressed through built in chat option and WhatsApp portal would also be active where your tutor would respond you within 24 hours of addressing your query.

faqs.question: Who all can attend this course?
faqs.answer: Anyone struggling with weight gain or a non- consistent workout routine can hop onto these sessions.

faqs.question: Do I need any equipment?
faqs.answer: No! These are no equipment workouts for you to practice them easily at home.

faqs.question: What is the procedure after I purchase this course?
faqs.answer: Once you register for our sessions, your course will be visible to you in ‘My stuff’. You can select your desired time slot once each day and can attend your session.

faqs.question: What if I miss a session?
faqs.answer: In case you miss a session, don’t worry. We offer flexible time slots to our users. You can select your desired time slot each day.

title.normal: by making amazing food like Masterchef

header: Whether moving away from the home for the first time or tired of PG/Hostel food

instructor.name: Mr. Prince Sharma
instructor.description: Prince Jain has guided a number of people through their cooking journey. Currently he holds 2+ years of experience in teaching individuals Cooking.

advantages.text: You will get to learn unique cooking methods,patterns adn techniques.
You will master the measurement of dry & fresh ingredients adn learn about spices and herbs.
You will become a confident home cook,even if you have never liked cooking.It's easier than you think.
You will learn how to setup your own kitchen,use appliances and many more.

checklist.text: You want to say 'No' to boring food & cook amazing dishes daily that you will be proud of?
You want to go beyond 'chai' & 'maggi' and you culinary journey?
You want to save money and impress you friends with your cooking skills like a master chef?
You don't want to rely on any third person to cook food for you?
